languages.text: "Ловко вы его раззадорили, Лорд-капитан. Давно не видела такого пыла в глазах старика".
"Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."
languages.original_text: "Ловко вы его раззадорили, Лорд-капитан. Давно не видела такого пыла в глазах старика".

traits.locale_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I've seen this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."
"Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I've seen this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."
"Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

"Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."
"Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

languages.text: « Bien joué, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cela faisait longtemps que je n'avais pas vu une telle flamme dans le regard de ce vieil homme. »
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

traits.locale_text: « Bien joué, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Cela faisait longtemps que je n'avais pas vu une telle flamme dans le regard de ce vieil homme. »

languages.text: «Bien jugado, Lord Capitán. Hacía tiempo que no veía ese fuego en los ojos del anciano».
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

traits.locale_text: «Bien jugado, Lord Capitán. Hacía tiempo que no veía ese fuego en los ojos del anciano».

languages.text: “真了不起，舰长大人，我已经很久都没在这个老家伙的眼睛里看到过这样的火焰了。”
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

traits.locale_text: “真了不起，舰长大人，我已经很久都没在这个老家伙的眼睛里看到过这样的火焰了。”

languages.text: 「よくやりましたね、ロード・キャプテン。この老人の目の中に、このような燃える炎を見たのは久しぶりです」
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

traits.locale_text: 「よくやりましたね、ロード・キャプテン。この老人の目の中に、このような燃える炎を見たのは久しぶりです」

languages.text: "Gut gespielt, Lord Captain. Es ist lange her, dass ich ein solches Feuer in den Augen des Alten gesehen habe."
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Gut gespielt, Lord Captain. Es ist lange her, dass ich ein solches Feuer in den Augen des Alten gesehen habe."

languages.text: "İyi hamleydi Lord Kaptan. İhtiyar adamın gözlerinde böylesine bir ateş görmemin üzerinden oldukça zaman geçmişti."
languages.original_text: "Well played, Lord Captain. It has been some time since I last saw this kind of fire in the old man's eyes."
